ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors would like to acknowledge the support of the Brazilian National Council for Scientific and Technological Development (CNPq), the Brazilian Coordination for the Improvement of Higher Education Personnel (CAPES), the Foundation for Research Support of the State of Amazonas (FAPEAM), the Federal University of Amazonas, Manaus, AM, Brazil.
